about_the_game:
Welcome to the Station

Dive into a gripping adventure as you enter the abandoned station that experienced a catastrophic explosion. Your mission? Extract the vital AI cores and uncover the truth about what went down in this mysterious outpost.

Intense Top-Down Action

Armed with a variety of weapons, you'll need to explore the station, overcome obstacles, and fend off any hostile entities lurking in the shadows. The station is vast and unpredictable, so expect the unexpected as you progress.

"It's not just about shooting – it's about survival. Make every bullet count!"

Your journey will be guided by the calm voice of Prize, your operator, who's keeping an eye on you through the station's security cameras. With every step you take, remember: you’re not alone, and danger is always just around the corner.

Upgrade and Adapt

As you progress, you'll collect upgrades to customize your weapons and make them your own. Enhance your firepower, improve your defenses, and adapt your arsenal to face the increasingly dangerous threats on the station.

A Station Full of Secrets

The station holds many secrets – some of them can help you, while others will test your limits. As you remove each AI core, you’ll gain deeper insight into what went wrong, but be careful: the station doesn’t like to be tampered with.

"You never know what might happen when you dig too deep."

Are You Ready?

Step into the darkness, arm yourself, and uncover the secrets that lie within the station. Are you ready to face what’s waiting for you?

content_descriptors.notes:
* Voice acting using some swear words from times to times.
* Usage of guns against robots.
* Dead bodies without dismemberment and some blood (stylized)

Welcome to the Station

Dive into a gripping adventure as you enter the abandoned station that experienced a catastrophic explosion. Your mission? Extract the vital AI cores and uncover the truth about what went down in this mysterious outpost.

Intense Top-Down Action

Armed with a variety of weapons, you'll need to explore the station, overcome obstacles, and fend off any hostile entities lurking in the shadows. The station is vast and unpredictable, so expect the unexpected as you progress.

Your journey will be guided by the calm voice of Prize, your operator, who's keeping an eye on you through the station's security cameras. With every step you take, remember: you’re not alone, and danger is always just around the corner.

name: Core Break

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 2700
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Explore an abandoned space station in this top-down action-adventure. Customize your weapons, face hostile threats, and extract AI cores to uncover hidden secrets. Survival is key as you navigate the station's unpredictable dangers, guided remotely by your operator, Pryce.
